headline: Healthpeak Properties Extends Its $3 Billion Revolving Credit Facility
summary: DENVER, December 09, 2024--Healthpeak Properties, Inc. (NYSE: DOC), a leading owner, operator, and developer of real estate for healthcare discovery and delivery, announced today that its operating partnership has amended and extended its $3 billion revolving credit facility ("Credit Facility"), as well as made conforming amendments to its outstanding term loans in connection with the Credit Facility.
